title: Pixel 5 still has apps crashing after factory reset, what else to try?
content:
Since I got it in November I've had problems with the device restarting sporadically and apps crashing until I restart the phone. All kinds of apps are crashing (Youtube, Pixel launcher, Chrome etc) not just 3rd party apps.
Yesterday I tried a factory reset to see if that should solve the problem but after only a few hours the problems started again with Youtube and Google News crashing.
I've done an "adb logcat" where I see logs like:
libc    : Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -1 (SI_QUEUE) in tid 30053 (initCrit3-1), pid 30029 (android.youtube)
libc    : Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -1 (SI_QUEUE) in tid 30380 (DISK #1), pid 30330 (.apps.magazines)
libc    : Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -1 (SI_QUEUE) in tid 30585 (.android.gms.ui), pid 30585 (.android.gms.ui)
etc
Any suggestions on what do do next?
